717868f-a.text:
378 Broome Street, north side, between Mott and Mulberry Streets. Shown is the R.C. Church of the Most Holy Crucifix.
June 9, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
717868f-a.folder: Broome Street & Mott Street, Manhattan, NY

717869f-a.text:
(1)
Broome Street, Mott, to Mulberry Street, (Before Reconstruction).
January 26, 1919.
(2)
Same. (After Reconstruction).
President Borough of Manhatten.
